attributes.action: Make fireworks illegal in built up areas
attributes.additional_details: Neighbours killed my rabbit with fireworks
attributes.background: Make fireworks illegal to buy in supermarkets. Make inly organised events have them and make then only on November the 5th

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign:

'Ban private firework displays after 8pm and the use of rockets in built up areas'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/627100


'Ban sale of fireworks to the public and limit sales to licensed displays only'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/616868

'Require a licence to buy or release any fireworks'
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/626683
